idea-plugin.name: Ferrous
idea-plugin.description:
About

Ferrous brings the official Rust Book (mdbook) color scheme to your JetBrains IDE. This is a faithful port of the three dark themes from the Rust documentation: Coal, Navy, and Ayu.

Perfect for Rust developers who love the familiar look of the Rust Book!

Themes

  • Ferrous Coal - The darkest theme with neutral gray tones (Tomorrow Night)
  • Ferrous Navy - Deep blue-tinted dark theme
  • Ferrous Ayu - Warm amber accents with muted backgrounds

Installation

After installing, go to Settings → Appearance → Theme and select a Ferrous theme.

Font

Optimized for Source Code Pro (size 14, line height 1.2) - the same font used in rustdoc.
